00014 #ifndef ULIB_SOAP_GENERIC_METHOD_H
00015 #define ULIB_SOAP_GENERIC_METHOD_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/net/rpc/rpc_object.h>
00018 #include <ulib/xml/soap/soap_fault.h>
00019 #include <ulib/xml/soap/soap_encoder.h>
00020 #include <ulib/net/rpc/rpc_gen_method.h>
00021 
00022 class U_EXPORT USOAPGenericMethod : public URPCGenericMethod {
00023 public:
00024 
00025         static UString* str_response;
00026 
00027         static void str_allocate();
00028 
00029         // COSTRUTTORI
00030 
00031         USOAPGenericMethod(const UString& n, UCommand* cmd, int rtype) : URPCGenericMethod(n, cmd, rtype)
00032                 {
00033                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USOAPGenericMethod, "%.*S,%p,%d", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(n), cmd, rtype) 
00034 
00035                 if (str_response == 0) str_allocate();
00036                 }
00037 
00038         virtual ~USOAPGenericMethod()
00039                 {
00040                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, USOAPGenericMethod)
00041                 }
00042 
00043         // VIRTUAL METHOD
00044 
00045         virtual void encode()
00046                 {
00047                 U_TRACE(0, "USOAPGenericMethod::encode()")
00048 
00049                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(URPCMethod::encoder)
00050 
00051                 if                (hasFailed())                                                                          U_SOAP_ENCODE_RES(                                                     response);
00052                 else if (URPCObject::isOutputBinary(response_type)) U_SOAP_ENCB64_NAME_ARG(*str_response, response);
00053                 else                                                                                                                             U_SOAP_ENCODE_NAME_ARG(*str_response, response);
00054                 }
00055 
00056         // DEBUG
00057 
00058 #ifdef DEBUG
00059         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return USOAPGenericMethod::dump(reset); }
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 protected:
00063 
00064         // Triggers the creation of the USOAPFault
00065 
00066         virtual void setFailed()
00067                 {
00068                 U_TRACE(0, "USOAPGenericMethod::setFailed()")
00069 
00070                 pFault = (URPCFault*) U_NEW(USOAPFault);
00071                 }
00072 
00073 private:
00074         USOAPGenericMethod(const USOAPGenericMethod& g) : URPCGenericMethod(UString::getStringNull(), 0, 0) {}
00075         USOAPGenericMethod& operator=(const USOAPGenericMethod& g)                                                                                                               { return *this; }
00076 };
00077 
00078 #endif
